Question: Lumen Technologies, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lumen Technologies, Inc.

Wi-Fi 7 Devices

- Lumen Technologies received Wi-Fi 7 certifications for two wireless devices, designed for its Quantum Fiber residential and small business customers to deliver faster speeds and better coverage than Wi-Fi 6/6E.
- The devices include MediaTek's Smart Link-Dispatch technology, enabling application performance with high-bandwidth and low-latency traffic in real-world settings.
- Quantum Fiber Wi-Fi 7 solution is an FCC 6GHz Standard Power (6SD) class device, unlocking the full power of the Quantum Fiber high-speed product up to 8 gigabits per second.
- Both devices support cloud-based Digital Twin technology and use the carrier-grade OpenWRT standard with Wi-Fi EasyMesh and prplMesh for real-time orchestration and advanced device management capabilities.
- Quantum Fiber installed its first customer Wi-Fi 7 device in December, with availability to new customers later in the month.
Summary_cn:
Lumen Technologies, Inc.（卢门科技公司）

Wi-Fi 7设备

- Lumen Technologies获得了两款Wi-Fi 7认证的无线设备，专为其量子光纤住宅和小型企业客户设计，可提供比Wi-Fi 6/6E更快的速度和更好的覆盖范围。
- 这些设备包括联发科技的Smart Link-Dispatch技术，能够在实际环境中通过高带宽和低延迟流量实现应用性能。
- 量子光纤Wi-Fi 7解决方案是一种FCC 6GHz标准功率（6SD）级设备，可将量子光纤高速产品的完整速度提升到每秒8千兆位。
- 这两款设备支持基于云的数字孪生技术，并使用运营级OpenWRT标准，配备Wi-Fi EasyMesh和prplMesh，以实现实时编排和高级设备管理功能。
- 量子光纤于12月安装了第一台客户Wi-Fi 7设备，并计划在本月晚些时候向新客户提供。
